content: The Act is titled the "Iran Sanctions Relief Review Act." It involves determining if foreign financial institutions have facilitated transactions for covered persons. Determination and certification of whether certain foreign persons have supported covered persons. The President must determine if foreign persons listed in Attachments 3 or 4 of the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action have supported covered persons and report to congressional committees every 180 days for up to 5 years.
